original_text: I must continue to praise myself. It will not really help you, but I will tell you anyway. The Lord has shown me special things, like in a dream.
korean_text: 무익하나마 내가 부득불 자랑하노니 주의 환상과 계시를 말하리라

sentences.original_text: I must continue to praise myself.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나 자신을 계속 칭찬해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: It will not really help you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 정말로 당신에게 도움이 되지 않겠지만

sentences.original_text: but I will tell you anyway.
The Lord has shown me special things
